text.div: Important: this ValueSet has been copied from IHE. It is published by Nictiz through the IHE domain as to guarantee continuity and availability of this profile. The IHE FormatCode Value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by IHE. This ValueSet additionally includes format codes defined by the HL7 CDA. The set was listed in HITSP C80 Table 2-153 Format Code Value Set Definition. The use of the FormatCode specifies the technical format of the document. The FormatCode is a further specialization more detailed than the mime-type. The FormatCode provides sufficient information to allow any potential document consumer to know if it can processing/display by identifying a document encoding, structure and template. The actual list of codes is intended to be extensible.

name: IHE.FormatCode.vs
title: IHE ValueSet of Format Codes for use with Document Sharing
description: Important: this ValueSet has been copied from IHE. It is published by Nictiz through the IHE domain as to guarantee continuity and availability of this profile. The IHE FormatCode Value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by IHE http://wiki.ihe.net/index.php?title=IHE_Format_Codes. This ValueSet additionally includes format codes defined by the HL7 CDA http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=CDA_Format_Codes_for_IHE_XDS. The set was listed in HITSP C80 Table 2-153 Format Code Value Set Definition. The use of the FormatCode specifies the technical format of the document. The FormatCode is a further specialization more detailed than the mime-type. The FormatCode provides sufficient information to allow any potential document consumer to know if it can process and/or display by identifying a document encoding, structure and template. The actual list of codes is intended to be extensible.
